title: It's 2016 and Runes really haven't changed much and they're still the worst part of the game
body: Rework the Rune system by next season for the love of everything good please. NO ONE likes grinding the IP for said runes, NO ONE likes being tied to 2 pages when you start and then being told you have to buy pages for the same amount that next champion you want costs, and no one likes that only 1 or 2 runes per category are viable.
